text: The 1989–90 Toshiba Rugby Union County Championship was the 90th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Lancashire won their 14th title after defeating Middlesex in the final. == First Round == {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 100%" |- !width=20| Pos !width=250| Northern Division !width=20| P
